favourite.article: This is a nice song, loved it.
We are still in this wonderful golden moment (Spirit,Soul and the Body) on earth, using this opportunity to grow in life, love the Lord, preaching gospel and waiting for His coming.
Let us pursue the maturity of life.... Pay attention with our inner life - the Spirit who dwells in us Be wise; the day approaches! O Come Lord Jesus!!!!
Oh, what a rest, what joy, what love, what favor to be His Bride when He comes to His feast!
Lord prepare us for Your coming!
Oh, let us not be left outside the feast.
Oh yes not only we're satisfied, God as well is satisfied, because we're His bride becoming the New Jerusalem! 主お讃美せよう!
I want to be ready for the cry, 'Behold Him'.
Oh Lord, we want to be ready for Your coming.
Lord, You're coming! We need to deny ourselves and express You Lord.
